Instruction: 'Wash and trim the woody ends of the asparagus spears.'
In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat.'
'Mince garlic cloves and add them to the skillet.'
Saute garlic in butter for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.'
'Add the asparagus spears to the skillet.'
Saute the asparagus for 5-7 minutes, or until tender-crisp, stirring occasionally.'
'Remove from heat and transfer to a serving dish.'
